author: Megan Rose Dickey
title: Instacart shoppers say company’s response to strike demands are ‘insulting’
description: Over the weekend, Instacart outlined its plans to better support shoppers amid the COVID-19 pandemic. For starters, Instacart has begun distributing its own hand sanitizer and disinfecting supplies and is working to place sanitation stations inside some retai…
